title: Friday Post Show (8-6-21)
itunes:title: Friday Post Show (8-6-21)
description:
Bobby on two reality shows that will give the contestants a chance to go into space. He talks about what the odds are if he would go into space if it was offered as a job on Breaking Bobby Bones Season 2. He updates us on if that 2nd season is a possibility. Amy also gives us an update on how her cat and dog are getting along. Eddie also talks about how he got real at the Meet the Teacher event last night. Bobby also reads some recent troll comments we’ve received on social media.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
